title: Curated Lists
content:
[[module css]]
 .content-panel {
     border: solid 1px #888880;
     border-radius: 10px;
     background-color: #999990;
     margin: 10px 0 15px;
     box-shadow: 3px 3px 6px #bbb;
     box-shadow: 0 2px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.5), inset 0 1px rgba(255,255,255,0.3), inset 0 10px rgba(255,255,255,0.2), inset 0 10px 20px rgba(255,255,255,0.25), inset 0 -15px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
}
 .content-panel.standalone {
     background: #fcfdfb;
}
 .content-panel.series {
     padding: 0 20px;
     margin-bottom: 20px;
     padding-bottom: 1rem;}
[[/module]]
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

With over 10,000 articles on the SCP Wiki, it can be hard to know where to start. Linked below are various pages created by members of the community to help you find the articles you're looking for - and likely many more that you never knew existed!

This page can be updated by any site member, so if you create something similar and post it on the wiki, feel free to add it to the appropriate section below (Recommended Articles and Thematic Listings are ordered from oldest to newest). Additionally, many of these lists rely on input from the community, so if you have suggestions, there are likely ways for you to contribute.

[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
+ Recommended Articles
Lists of article recommendations, submitted by members of the community.
* [[[User-Curated Lists]]] - A page for members of the site to list their recommended articles. Features both general recommendations and more specific groupings by theme or style.
* [[[Curated Tale Series]]] - A stylish collection of tales grouped by genre, with a different tale series featured every month.
* [[[Algorithm Curated Recommendations]]] - An algorithm's predictions for what the average SCP reader will enjoy, divided into various categories. 
[[/div]]


[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
+ Thematic Listings
If you're looking for something specific, the pages below may help.
* [[[Format Screw Hub]]] - Articles that put a creative twist on the standard SCP format.
* [[[Holiday Hub]]] - Celebrate the season in anomalous fashion with these holiday-themed articles!
* [[[April Fools Hub]]] - Pages created or altered as part of April Fool's Day jokes.
* [[[milk-hub| Milk Hub]]] - Articles featuring milk, or other dairy products.
* [[[Reimagined Hub]]] - Articles that take inspiration from an existing work, altering the idea to create something new.
[[/div]]

[[div class="content-panel standalone series"]]
+ Featured Content Archives
Members of site staff select different articles to feature on the front page every month, which have been archived in the pages below. To see all pages tagged with //featured//, click [/system:page-tags/tag/featured here].
* [[[Artist Showcase Archive]]]
* [[[Event Featured Archive]]]
* [[[Featured GoI Format Archive]]]
* Featured SCP Archives
 * [[[featured-scp-archive | Archive I - 1 through 100]]]
 * [[[featured-scp-archive-ii | Archive II - 101 through 200]]]
* Featured Tale Archives
 * [[[featured-tale-archive | Archive I - 1 through 100]]]
 * [[[featured-tale-archive-ii | Archive II - 101 through 200]]]
* Reviewers' Spotlight Archives
 * [[[reviewers-spotlight-archive | Reviewers' Spotlight Archive I (2019 through 2021)]]]
 * [[[reviewers-spotlight-archive-ii|Reviewers' Spotlight Archive II (2022 through 2024)]]]
[[/div]]

++ See Also
* [[[Top Rated Pages]]] - Listing articles with the most upvotes.
* [[[young-and-under-30| Underread and Underrated]]] - Articles with less than 30 net upvotes.
* [[[Podcast Hub]]] - Links to podcasts, some of which discuss and recommend specific SCP articles.
